import React, { Component } from 'react' import { Input, List, Card, Pagination, Drawer, Form, Button, Col, Row, Space, Select, message } from 'antd'; import { PlusOutlined } from '@ant-design/icons'; const { Option } = Select export default class Order extends Component { myForm = React.createRef() // 清空表单 onReset = () => { this.myForm.current.resetFields() } render() { const columns = [ { title: '编号', dataIndex: 'carriageNumber', key: '1', align: 'center', }, { title: '级别', dataIndex: 'level', key: '2', align: 'center', }, { title: '规格', dataIndex: 'size', key: '3', align: 'center', }, { title: '座位数', key: '4', dataIndex: 'seatNumber', align: 'center', }, { title: '价格基数', key: '5', dataIndex: 'priceBase', align: 'center', }, { title: '适配车型', key: '6', dataIndex: 'adapter', align: 'center', }, { title: '操作', key: '7', render: () => ( 编辑 删除 ), align: 'center' }, ]; return (
车厢管理} >
( 成都 )} />
) } }
